name: Krnch
description:
Skid around the post-apocalyptic desert in your souped-up gun-toting deathmobile and try to be the last one still rolling.

KRNCH is high-speed local-multiplayer fun for 2-4 players.

XBox 360 controllers or compatible recommended.

(Problems with controller compatibility? Give x360ce a try.)

Controls

RS - Steer

RT - Accelerate

LT - Decelerate/Reverse

A - Fire/Select

B - Cycle Weapons / Cancel

Start - Pause

Easy!

Follow development of Krnch on Twitter: @washingupgames

What's new:

Build 4 (December 30th 2016)

  • Added coins.
  • Added stuff to buy with coins.
  • Fixed a ton of bugs!

Build 3 (July 14th 2016)

  • BUG FIX: You can now navigate menus and select vehicles with the left stick.
  • BUG FIX: Cancel button now works on the end-game confirmation menu.
  • Explosions are hot!
  • The machine gun is slightly less so!

Build 2 (July 13th 2016)

  • Exploding Barrels!
  • Random Cactus!
  • Allowing yourself to overheat will cause damage until cooled off.
  • Smoother camera zooming.
  • Vehicle selection screen.
  • New vehicle colours.
  • BUG FIX: Weapon heat not reset at start of new round.
  • BUG FIX: Explosions and wrecks rendered on top of cactus.
